title: By 10 o'clock Georgie has been sent out of the rooming house to his playground--the sidewalk.  His friends, truckmen and loaders, keep an eye on him during the day.
dimensions: sheet (trimmed to image): 24.5 x 34.5 cm (9 5/8 x 13 9/16 in.)
creditline: Robert Frank Collection, Gift of Robert Frank
